How to install:
1. Run Bounce Symphony_setup.exe

#################################################

About the game:

It's an addictive, extraordinary puzzle game full of orchestral soundtracks and 3 modes of play! This flavorful game was designed to tease your mind and thrill the senses. You'll need to keep your eyes peeled for some entertaining surprise levels scattered throughout the full version of the game. This game was made for sitting back, relaxing, and enjoying a soothing display of matching and meditative music. The Victorian look and the relaxing orchestral score help make this a blissful gaming experience!
